description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
Course description

This course aims to develop students’ English proficiency.  Students are expected to increase their reading and writing literacy along with listening comprehension and communication performance through a variety of in-class and out-of-class activities.

Course requirements

**1\. Textbook**

Required Textbook: _Keynote **4**_

**2\. Attendance and Participation**

Punctual attendance in class is REQUIRED**.** Though you can learn from the readings, you can learn the most from interacting/practicing with others and actively participating in in-class activities. Your participation in class will be evaluated too. Absence from a class is no excuse for not knowing the assignments/exams and what has been covered in that class.
